esp.todo:

eng.todo:
Backend and SQL Developer for a point-of-sale platform in a restaurant chain, developed in Java using frameworks such as Spring Boot and Hibernate. 
Backend Developer and QA for an application in the school area using Typescript.

Coordinator of Processes and Technology, responsible for creating and monitoring processes to ensure the correct and efficient use of school technologies and platforms. 
Configuration of modules in Zoho as well as the Deluge scripting language. 
Creation of a mobile application with AppSheet.

eng.place: INEGI (Instituto nacional de estadística y geografía)
eng.todo:

Creation of mobile applications with Power Apps.
Teacher and coordinator of the degree programs in Animation and Digital Art, Computer Systems Engineering, and Architecture.
